item.title: Weighed in at under 230 lbs this morning
item.description: Nothing but food moderation, occasional exercise, and riding my bike 4 miles every day. I didnt even cut anything from my diet, just counting Kcal to stay bellow an average of 15,000 kcal per week. Next milestone is 200, with a final goal of around 165-180.

item.title: Texas Representative Jasmine Crockett And Jane Fonda Push For "Yes" On CA Prop 50
item.description: The Texas GOP Gerrymandering wasn't just to pick up added Republican Seats, but to eliminate Democrat ones, including U.S. Rep. Jasmine Crockett's, out of a District. They even Redistricted her own house out of her District. California and other Democratic States need to fight what Trump and Texas Gov. Abbott have started.
item.dc:creator: OceansRust

item.title: I used to like shopping etsy for handmade stuff for presents. No more.
item.description: It was bad last year, but there were still some people on there making stuff. Now? I can barely find anything through all the bullshit bot and reselling scam accounts. I spent 2 hours today looking through Etsy to get my Christmas shopping out of the way. The main thing I have noticed is that there are literally thousands of accounts selling the exact same stuff that is just temu trash that has either been hotglued together or just sold as is at a higher price with a fake "handmade" label. Then there are the shitty AI generated pics that are on the other thousands of accounts just trying to get you to make any purchase and not send you anything. I am sick of factory made garbage and I want to give my friends and family quality gifts. I want to support small time artists and artisans.

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1512 (antler bae)
item.description:
Let's get this bread. (Hunc panem accipiamus)
I should have saved a bunch of Mesoamerican memes for post 1519, but eh.
Blue-headed Vireo (not my photo)
Debating going birding today but at the same time I just want to stay home and lounge with this headache.
Mood.
I did this a lot as a teenager. Mostly to look at the stars or try and find Owls.
Please?
Also by reading Terry Pratchett.
The same thing, but worse, happened during the conquest of the Americas, leading to the worst parts of the Little Ice Age.
They're called "ruling lizards" because they fucking rule, buddy.
Mood.
Ngl, if i went to a woman's house and she had a skull cup and a dagger and those particular glasses, she might be the one. (Those are high end cocktail glasses, my friends. I have one i found at a yard sale)
This has big @xbadxfaeriex, @racheKatze, @NegasonicAdultEMP, @Ronelyn and @kaeldra vibes which is probably why y'all are some of my favorite femmes on Imgur, and i would alwardly flirt with all of you (or, uh, already have tried, lol)
Lincoln's Sparrow. I have to say that this is one of my favorite sparrow species.
Medieval takes on Lovecraft stories
Great-tailed Grackle (with a chicken bone)
Seriously.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "Peekaboo! Peekaboo! [Coughing noises] Good morning, step up. Pretty bird." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett

item.title: Potato's Daily Dirties
item.description:
back to being apathetic and doing the meme dumps. also really want to order a greasy fast food borgor tonight cause craving one and also cannot decide from where. never tried checkers and rallys and they also have fountain cherry coke. so might try. or jack in the box but for some reason the one near me is closed til midnight? so i guess another one a mile further out. I unno. I dont know what im doing and being decisive is not something i am good at. just want borgor. anyway. more memes. enjoy!
...
om but toys.
I do need to change my location again and also dont want to put my kitty through another big move. plus did work pretty hard to have nice two bedroom setup here so gonna hold out and just travel until either some of my supports fail, dad passes or kitty passes. then i will do the things of moving again.
mhmm
this happened the other day after i had posted and it was up for so many hours. had gone to bed so woke up to the message like huh.
taking a break from drinking and also hard liquor is trouble. sticking to just seltzer type things that i cant over mix or drink straight.
I am fully a sub when involved with someone and outside of that can be very om. different with frens and stuff. like back when i use to have irl frens id take em out for food and buy them little stuffs sometimes.
my cat is next to me whining. need to finish dis up so i can give him attention.
i miss pet names... from very specific people. *not an invitation for anyone at all to call me any pet names so do not. fuck off. hate that people think they can do that without permission.*
mhmm.
good show. should rewatch.
The above image was made by the wonderful @PyroDragon! They have their own channel in the Deviousness discord where they share links to their dumps and be an all around dragony dragon! I has a Deviousness discord server! We do have a hard rule of no politics and/or religion. The discord is a safe space to get away from the bullshit going on. We have a bunch of areas including a SFW area, content creator area, a NSFW area and more! We have gaming fun! We have spontaneous gaming and some ping roles for people to use to get groups together based on US and EU time zones! We have movie nights on Saturdays! So feel free to wander in and say haii! Thank you to everyone who has joined and made it such a unique and special place! Deviousness discord that is 18+: https://discord.gg/deviousness If you have issues with link see dis: https://imgur.com/a/8GUNAz4 Deviousness steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DeviousnessDiscord
artist of work above (aside from my signing potato on it): https://florahv.artstation.com/projects/XnL8P3 I am on dis now and trying to remember to linky over there too for when I post and also post the memes that get removed: https://bsky.app/profile/potatocheesmonk.bsky.social I has a post with links to all my past posts. enjoy: https://imgur.com/a/ZDA2CBe #deliciousness #potato #memes #dailydirties

item.title: My kiddo was a jellyfish this year.
item.description: We have a rule for Halloween costumes, there must be a practical aspect and it can be worn with warm clothes. Cars halted for her, the forecast called for rain, but her costume kept her visible, dry, and warm. She had a great night.

item.title: GovBrief Today #274
item.description: The United Nations condemned the U.S. today for 14 separate boat attacks that have killed 61 people. The High Commissioner for Human Rights made that announcement before SNAP’s food aid benefits for one of every 8 Americans were set to go unfunded by the federal government. Two federal judges ordered Trump to restart the funds because the Agriculture Secretary said “that well has run dry.” Trump might as well have said, “Let them eat cake.” He raced to his Mar-a-Lago resort mid-afternoon to attend a Halloween party themed “A Little Party Never Killed Nobody” with a band and some guests in 1920s costumes. On the way there, he posted pictures of the Lincoln Bathroom renovated to his specifications in marble and gold trim. Let’s get our communities bread and substantial food instead of cake. Find your local food pantry and donate if you can. Volunteer if you can’t. Check on neighbors who depend on SNAP. And when someone tries to normalize any of this, tell them about how Trump spent the hours leading up to Americans going hungry. Notice you’re seeing less news on social media? We track the data – you’re right. Social media networks are suppressing news stories more every day. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. Data, images, searchable archive. Free and private at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/alabama-man-faith-threats [2] https://go.govbrief.today/fbi-dearborn-plot [3] https://go.govbrief.today/rubio-trump-deny-attack [4] https://go.govbrief.today/fluoride-supplement-ban-maha [5] https://go.govbrief.today/maine-health-center-close [6] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-medical-neglect-report [7] https://go.govbrief.today/un-condemns-boat-attacks [8] https://go.govbrief.today/vance-wife-religion-comments [9] https://go.govbrief.today/judge-stops-citizenship-voting [10] https://go.govbrief.today/ohio-map-approval-redistricting [11] https://go.govbrief.today/gop-media-threat-trump [12] https://go.govbrief.today/wh-media-access [13] https://go.govbrief.today/pentagon-ukraine-tomahawk-missiles [14] https://go.govbrief.today/military-trans-rule-ban [15] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-nuclear-testing-soon [16] https://go.govbrief.today/snap-benefits-shutdown-orders [17] https://go.govbrief.today/ny-court-blocks-texas [18] https://go.govbrief.today/park-police-trump-crackdown [19] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-chicago-halloween [20] https://go.govbrief.today/gop-senate-retain-filibuster [21] https://go.govbrief.today/fdic-confirmation-hearing [22] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-lincoln-bathroom [23] https://go.govbrief.today/kennedy-center-sales-drop [24] https://go.govbrief.today/senate-committee-boat-attacks Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
